com.percussion.pso.utils
Class AbstractTemplateExpander

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.utils.AbstractTemplateExpander
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.extension.IPSExtension, com.percussion.services.publisher.IPSTemplateExpander
public abstract class AbstractTemplateExpander
extends Object
implements com.percussion.services.publisher.IPSTemplateExpander

An abstract base class for Template Expanders. Unlike the undocumented system class PSBaseTemplateExpander this class allows selection of templates at the individual item level. Subclasses must supply the findTemplates(IPSGuid, IPSGuid, IPSGuid, int, PSComponentSummary, Node, Map) method which generates the list of templates for the content item.

In addition, there are 2 hook methods: preprocessResults(QueryResult, Map, Map) and postprocessContentList(List). These will be called before and after each content list. They can be used by implementations that need to do caching or other processing at the content list level. As with all IPSExtension implementations, there is only one instance of each Template Expander. It is the implementers responsibility to use the hook methods in a thread-safe manner.

Author:
DavidBenua

findTemplates

protected abstract List<com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid> findTemplates(com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid itemGuid,
                                                                         com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid folderGuid,
                                                                         com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid siteGuid,
                                                                         int context,
                                                                         com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSComponentSummary summary,
                                                                         javax.jcr.Node contentNode,
                                                                         Map<String,String> parameters)
Find the publishable templates for an item.

Parameters:
itemGuid - the item guid. Never null.
folderGuid - the folder guid. Never null.
siteGuid - the site guid. May be null if not using site folder publishing.
context - the publishing context. Never null.
summary - the item summary. Never null.
contentNode - the content node. Will be null if the needsContentNode property is false.
parameters - the parameters passed to the template expander. Never null.
Returns:
the template guids for this item.

preprocessResults

protected javax.jcr.query.QueryResult preprocessResults(javax.jcr.query.QueryResult results,
                                                        Map<String,String> parameters,
                                                        Map<Integer,com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSComponentSummary> summaryMap)
Preprocess the query results. This method will always be called before the first call to findTemplates. It may be used to replace or add columns to the result set, or as a general hook for preprocessing.

Parameters:
results - the query results. Never null
parameters - the parameters passed to expand. Never null or empty
summaryMap - the component summary map.
Returns:
the query results. Must not be null

postprocessContentList

protected List<com.percussion.services.publisher.data.PSContentListItem> postprocessContentList(List<com.percussion.services.publisher.data.PSContentListItem> clist)
PostProcess the content list. This method will always be called after the last call to findTemplates. It may be used to modify the resulting list of content list items, or to perform any cleanup required after the content list is completed.

Parameters:
clist - the content list items. Nevernull.
Returns:
the content list items. Nevernull.

buildNodeMap

protected Map<com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid,javax.jcr.Node> buildNodeMap(javax.jcr.query.QueryResult result,
                                                                             Map<Integer,com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSComponentSummary> summaryMap)
                                                                      throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
Builds the map of Node objects. The nodes may be used to access the properties of the content items in the content list.

Parameters:
result - the query result. Never null. Contains one row for each item in the content list.
summaryMap - the map of component summaries. Never null. This map is guaranteed to contain all items referenced in the query result.
Returns:
the map of Nodes.
Throws:
javax.jcr.RepositoryException
